tutorial.title: Flexbox
tutorial.descriptionContent: Challenges are more difficult exercises that will test your skills.

executableContent.instructions:
Make the `#container` `<div>` a flexbox `<div>` by appropriately setting the `display` property. When finished, the registration steps will display horizontally.

1. Properly target the `container` div and assign an appropriate `display` property to turn it into a flexbox container.

executableContent.instructions:
We know that when applying flexbox to a container, some properties are set by default. Let's explicitly apply the appropriate `flex-direction` property such that the `<div>` orientation remains horizontal. 

1. Set the `#container` `<div>` element's `flex-direction` property such that the `<div>` orientation does not change (remains horizontal and in ascending order).

Use your knowledge of Flexbox container axes to horizontally center the green circle. Select a CSS property that aligns along the main axis. 

1. Appropriately assign the CSS property to horizontally center the green circle in the `#shapes` Flexbox container.

executableContent.instructions:
Use your knowledge of Flexbox container axes to place the blue square at the bottom of the `#shapes` container. Since the default `flex-direction` is `row`, you'll need to select a property that aligns along the cross axis.

1. Appropriately assign the CSS property align the blue square at the bottom of the `#shapes` Flexbox container.
